Package main.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomErrorController
    Controller: CustomErrorController Description: implements from ErrorController to return custom error template (404)
    DeleteController
    Controller: DeleteController Description: this controller will handle the delete request to clean the database table content.
    GHSearchController
    Controller: GHSearchController Description: This Controller handling the Github search. it will get the parameter and than Use the explained (and will explained again in "Members" section) beans to get the json content and modifying the model to return the login and the followers details after saving / updating the database.
    HistoryController
    Controller: HistoryController Description: This controller handling the history content filed.
    LoginController
    Controller: LoginController Description: This controller managing the login with LoginBean Object and its Custom validator.
    LogoutController
    Controller: LogoutController Description: Handling logout requests Members: log - injected LoginSessionBean to change the logged flag
    MainController
    Controller: MainController Description: Handling the main mapping '/' page.
